Summary: Son frightened by ufo in front yard.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around April 15th 2010
divs: Sighting Details My son whose name in Joshua,was playing in the front yard of our home when he says he saw a UFO. He told me that to the west of my home he saw a brightly lit object fly close to our home and stop to the south. He said it was like a upside down triangle. when it stopped,red and orange lights twinkled, like christmas lights and the center of the shape was see thru.he then said the UFO that was silent flew south faster than anything he had ever seen.My son is a 3.75 gpa student and I know he is telling the truth.
